pageContext.claim: “The incompetent Mayor of London, Sadiq Khan, was bothered that I played a very fast round of golf yesterday. Many Pols exercise for hours, or travel for weeks. Me, I run through one of my courses (very inexpensive). President Obama would fly to Hawaii. Kahn should focus on knife crime, which is totally out of control in London. People are afraid to even walk the streets. He is a terrible mayor who should stay out of our business!”
pageContext.analysis: Obama flew to Hawaii to go on vacation; he would not fly there just to play a round of golf. When in Washington, Obama would play golf nearby. Knife crimes have been increasing in London in recent years, but its rate of homicides attributed to cutting or stabbing remains lower than New York City. The overall murder rate in New York is twice as high as London.
